environment_variables.input_dir: Path to input directory containing bedGraph files with methylation calls
environment_variables.output_dir: Path to output directory where to store compressed bigwig files for visualisation
environment_variables.chrom_sizes_path: Path to a chromsome sizes file (chrom.sizes) for the reference genome used for alignment
environment_variables.sample_list_path: Path to a text file containing a list of samples (one sample per line). Sample names should match file naming patterns.

resources.tasks: Number of tasks in the array job
